General.Name: Medprin Regenerative Medical Technologies Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Medprin Regenerative Medical Technologies Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of regenerative implantable medical devices. It offers ReDura, NeoDura, and Recranio, and other products for neurosurgery, dental surgery, and 3D bioprinting applications serving patients internationally. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
General.Address: Guangzhou High-tech Ind. Dev Zn, Guangzhou, China, 510663
